001package src.pkg_models;
002import src.pkg_rooms.Room;
003import src.pkg_items.Item;
004
005/**
006 * MovingCharacter class represents a character that can move between rooms.
007 * It extends the Character class and provides functionality to change the room of the character.
008 * 
009 * @author Pierre MATAR
010 */
011public class MovingCharacter extends Characterr
012{
013    private Room aRoom;
014    
015    /**
016     * Constructs a MovingCharacter with the specified name, text to say, response, item, and room.
017     *
018     * @param pName the name of the character
019     * @param pTextToSay the text the character will say
020     * @param pResponse the response of the character
021     * @param pItem the item associated with the character
022     */
023    
024    public MovingCharacter(final String pName, final String pTextToSay, final String pResponse, final Item pItem) {
025        super(pName, pTextToSay, pResponse, pItem);
026    }
027
028     /**
029     * Sets the room of the character.
030     *
031     * @param pRoom the room to set
032     */
033    
034    public void setRoom(final Room pRoom) {
035        this.aRoom = pRoom;
036    }
037    
038    /**
039     * Moves the character.
040     * 
041     * @param pRoom the room to move the character to
042     */
043    
044    public void move(final Room pRoom) {
045        this.aRoom.removeCharacter(this);
046        this.setRoom(pRoom);
047        this.aRoom.addCharacter(this);
048    }
049}
